DOC.brief_summary: Adenosine-triphosphate ( ATP ) serve sole energy source muscle contraction . Therefore human performance brief maximal exercise limit , part , availability ATP contract muscle . Because muscle ATP storage small ( enough sustain maximal exercise le 1 second ) , factor enhance either storage resynthesis ATP may positive impact repeat muscle contraction . The current study test hypothesis increase ATP availability muscle via oral supplementation improve performance repeat high intensity exercise measure ) work perform three 50 contraction fatigue test , b ) sum total work perform , c ) percentage decrement total work first third third 50 contraction test .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Oral Adenosine-triphosphate ( ATP ) Human Muscle Performance
DOC.detailed_description: To date study 10 subject follow 3 original intervention ( Placebo , 250 mg PeakATP/d 400 mg PeakATP/d ) . Currently receive approval expand study 5 additional subject receive Placebo , 400 mg PeakATP/d 400 mg PealATP/d plus proprietary blend intervention .
DOC.criteria: No major medical condition ; Able perform fatigue testing procedure ; Not currently take prescription medication ; Not currently take dietary supplement ( daily multivitamin exceed RDA permit ) Major medical condition affect metabolism general function ; Not able perform fatigue test ; Taking prescription medication ; Taking dietary supplement multivitamin exceed RDA
